comment.author: 92916829@N08
comment._content:
I am related to Edward G. Kimmitt through his uncle Rev. Edward Kimmitt. Edward's father was John Joseph Kimmitt of Belfast, c. 1829-1897.
1901 Ireland Census, County Armagh, 31 Dobbin St. , Armagh
Edward Gilbert Kimmitt (E.G. Kimmitt) 40, Church of Ireland, Master Painter
Eva Florence Kimmitt 28
Eileen Maud Kimmitt 6
Walter Joseph Kimmitt 5
Edward Andrew Kimmitt 3
